Package com.xtremelabs.robolectric.internal

Interface Summary
RobolectricTestRunnerInterface

AppSingletonizer<T>

Annotation Types Summary
DoNotInstrument Indicates that a class should not be stripped/instrumented under any circumstances.
Implementation Indicates that a method declaration is intended to Shadow a method with the same signature on the associated Android class.
Implements Indicates that a class declaration is intended to Shadow an Android class declaration.
Instrument Indicates that a class should always be instrumented by AndroidTranslator regardless of its package.
RealObject Shadow fields annotated @RealObject will have the real instance injected.
